metadata.title: CVE-2018-5811 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description: An error within the "nikon_coolscan_load_raw()" function(internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.9 can beexploited to cause an out-of-bounds read memory access and subsequentlycause a crash.

criterions.comment: darktable package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
